price: এই গছজোপা উৎপন্ন হয় জাহান্নামৰ তলৰ পৰা,
arabic: إِنَّهَا شَجَرَةٞ تَخۡرُجُ فِيٓ أَصۡلِ ٱلۡجَحِيمِ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: innahā shajaratun takhruju fī aṣli al-jaḥīmi
